name: Liquidation (itch) (ZeldasDoritos)
description:
**Warning: There are some parts of the game that contain flashes (gun minigame and boss fight), please proceed with caution if flashes of light aggravate you or trigger epilepsy.

As a newly certified detective looking for a fresh start, you discover upon the seemingly peaceful and sparsely populated town of Barton.  Luckily for you, they are currently looking for one to fill in the gap! However, not everything is as it seems. Will you be able to solve the onslaught of mysteries that come your way? What secrets will you discover? Only one way to find out in LIQUIDATION.

This game is episodic, meaning it will be gradually released in episodes. Episode one is available!

It is highly recommend for the game be played on default 1920 x 1080 aspect ratio.
